title: The Last Great Prophet: A Christian Novel
description: The Last Great Prophet is a compelling Christian fiction novel told through the story of Jim Mackerson, who at the brink of death and alcoholism discovers a new purpose and a blinding passion to bring the lost to Christ before it is too late.Throughout his prophetic journey, Jim's message is not well received by The Faithfuls and evil is stirring in the White House. They will stop at nothing to destroy the prophet and those who follow his teachings. Redemption is not the message they want shared.The Last Great Prophet is a powerful story that shines light on our hidden fears of the end times and the struggle between good and evil. Readers will find themselves aligning with one side or the other in this story by Mississippi author Charlie Applegate. Which side will you choose?
author: Charlie Appleton
